exercises.name: Barbell Bench Press
exercises.description: A fundamental upper body exercise that targets the chest, shoulders, and triceps. Lie on a flat bench and press the barbell from chest to full extension.
instructions: Lie flat on bench with feet on floor
Grip barbell slightly wider than shoulder width
Lower bar to mid-chest with control
Press bar up to starting position

exercises.name: Barbell Back Squat
exercises.description: The king of leg exercises. A compound movement that builds overall lower body strength and mass.
instructions: Descend by breaking at hips and knees
Lower until thighs are parallel or below
Drive through heels to return to start

exercises.name: Conventional Deadlift
exercises.description: A total body strength builder that primarily targets the posterior chain. One of the most effective exercises for building overall strength.
instructions: Stand with feet hip-width apart, bar over mid-foot
Bend down and grip bar just outside legs
Keep back straight, chest up, core tight
Drive through heels, extending hips and knees
Stand fully upright, then lower with control

exercises.name: Overhead Press
exercises.description: A fundamental shoulder exercise that builds pressing strength and shoulder stability.
instructions: Stand with barbell at shoulder height
Press bar overhead until arms fully extended
Lower bar to shoulders with control

exercises.name: Pull-Up
exercises.description: A bodyweight exercise that builds back width and pulling strength.
instructions: Hang from bar with overhand grip
Pull yourself up until chin over bar

exercises.name: Bent Over Barbell Row
exercises.description: A compound pulling exercise that builds back thickness and strength.
instructions: Bend at hips with slight knee bend
Grip bar slightly wider than shoulders
Pull bar to lower chest/upper abdomen

exercises.name: Dumbbell Bicep Curl
exercises.description: An isolation exercise for building bicep size and strength.
instructions: Stand with dumbbells at sides, palms forward

exercises.name: Overhead Tricep Extension
exercises.description: An isolation exercise targeting the triceps, particularly the long head.
instructions: Hold dumbbell overhead with both hands

exercises.name: Leg Press
exercises.description: A machine-based compound exercise for building leg strength with less spinal loading than squats.
instructions: Sit in machine with back against pad

exercises.name: Romanian Deadlift
exercises.description: A hip-hinge movement that targets the hamstrings and glutes with emphasis on the eccentric phase.
instructions: Stand holding barbell at hip level
Keeping slight knee bend, push hips back
Lower bar along legs until hamstring stretch
Drive hips forward to return to start

exercises.name: Dumbbell Lateral Raise
exercises.description: An isolation exercise for building shoulder width by targeting the lateral deltoid.

exercises.name: Incline Barbell Bench Press
exercises.description: A variation of the bench press that emphasizes the upper chest and front deltoids.
instructions: Lie back with feet on floor
Grip bar slightly wider than shoulders

exercises.name: Cable Chest Fly
exercises.description: An isolation exercise for the chest that maintains constant tension throughout the movement.
instructions: Bring handles together in front of chest

exercises.name: Cable Face Pull
exercises.description: An exercise for rear deltoids and upper back health, improving posture and shoulder balance.
instructions: Set cable to face height with rope attachment
Focus on rear deltoids and upper back

exercises.name: Lying Leg Curl
exercises.description: An isolation exercise specifically targeting the hamstrings.
instructions: Lie face down on leg curl machine

exercises.name: Leg Extension
exercises.description: An isolation exercise for the quadriceps, performed on a machine.

exercises.name: Plank
exercises.description: A fundamental core stability exercise that builds endurance in the abdominals and lower back.
instructions: Start in push-up position on forearms

exercises.name: Push-Up
exercises.description: A classic bodyweight exercise for building upper body pushing strength.
instructions: Lower body until chest near floor

exercises.name: Parallel Bar Dips
exercises.description: A bodyweight exercise that targets the chest, triceps, and shoulders.
instructions: Grip parallel bars and support body weight
Lean forward for more chest activation

exercises.name: Walking Dumbbell Lunge
exercises.description: A unilateral leg exercise that builds strength and improves balance.
instructions: Push off front foot to step forward

exercises.name: Standing Calf Raise
exercises.description: An isolation exercise for building calf muscle size and strength.
instructions: Stand with balls of feet on elevated surface

exercises.name: Front Squat
exercises.description: A squat variation with the bar positioned on the front shoulders, emphasizing the quads and core.
instructions: Position barbell on front of shoulders
Keep elbows high, upper arms parallel to floor

exercises.name: Goblet Squat
exercises.description: A beginner-friendly squat variation using a dumbbell or kettlebell held at chest level.

exercises.name: Chin-Up
exercises.description: A pull-up variation using an underhand grip, placing more emphasis on the biceps.
instructions: Hang from bar with underhand grip
Pull up until chin over bar

exercises.name: Seated Cable Row
exercises.description: A horizontal pulling exercise that builds back thickness and strength.

exercises.name: Arnold Press
exercises.description: A shoulder press variation that rotates through full range of motion, hitting all three deltoid heads.
instructions: Start with dumbbells at shoulders, palms facing you
Press up while rotating palms forward
End with arms extended, palms forward

exercises.name: Cable Crunch
exercises.description: An ab exercise using cable resistance for progressive overload.
instructions: Kneel facing cable machine with rope
Hold rope at sides of head

exercises.name: Bulgarian Split Squat
exercises.description: A unilateral leg exercise with the rear foot elevated, excellent for building leg strength and balance.
instructions: Place rear foot on bench behind you
Push through front heel to stand

exercises.name: Hammer Curl
exercises.description: A bicep curl variation with neutral grip that also targets the brachialis and forearms.
instructions: Hold dumbbells with palms facing each other

exercises.name: Skull Crusher (Lying Tricep Extension)
exercises.description: An effective tricep isolation exercise performed lying on a bench.
instructions: Lie on bench holding barbell or EZ bar
Lower bar towards forehead by bending elbows

exercises.name: Barbell Hip Thrust
exercises.description: The premier exercise for building glute strength and size.
instructions: Sit on ground with upper back against bench
Roll barbell over hips (use pad for comfort)
Drive through heels, thrusting hips up
Squeeze glutes at top, lower with control
